page.title: 19Tourism Problems in Shoreham
page.content: After questioning people in Shoreham it was found that they thought Shoreham lacks facilities and entertainment for potential tourists. The residents said that Shoreham should build more and better facilities.When asked if they would welcome more tourists they showed mixed feelings,but most agreed as more facilities would be built.Others said "No"as it would spoil the peace and quiet.The residents attitudes to whether too many tourists came,were non-plussed.Too many tourists didn't come.The sea would not be the only attraction;hotels would be needed if tourism were to be encouraged.Most people disagreed to a hotel being built.But as they had earlier said that they would agree with the influx or even wanted more tourists they had contradicted themselves.
